name: Laser Defender (ecmapps)
description:
Have fun protecting the Earth from the alien invasion with this Unity version of this classic game. I am a student. Most of the assets come from Kenney.nl

Music from:

Siste Viator by Clearside, used under CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 license
Assimilator by Clearside, used under CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 license
Coma by Clearside, used under CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 license

Font:

Earth Orbiter - Daniel Zadorozny used under CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 license

Enjoy and leave feedback please!
